profile:
Dodds Garage Door Systems gives new meaning to the word "reliability".
"We show up when we say we will, we do the job with the expertise of over 52 years in the business, and we tidy up. We never leave a mess!"
"When you require garage door service or garage door electric opener attention, please call us. You won't be sorry. We guarantee it!"
Having done that, just sit down and relax, you have just hired Greater Toronto's #1 garage door company, Dodds Garage Door Systems is your RELIABLE garage door firm.
Dodds major products are "SERVICE", "VALUE", and "CUSTOMER SATISFACTION!"

Dodds Garage Door Systems Inc. is an all-Canadian privately owned company, established in 1958, specializing in the sale, repairs, service and installation of:

profile:
When all others fail, call the geeks. We will figure it out or your money back!

Garage Door Geeks are dedicated to bringing you satisfaction. With over 10 years of experience, our skilled technicians offer exceptional service to help keep your door last you longer. Garage Door Geeks technicians are provided with the skills and parts needed to make your door run smoothly. We offer warranty on all work that our qualified technicians perform on your garage door, along with the parts installed.

Our warranty is unbeatable, with flexible plans to help your garage door hold together strong for longer. We have great deals that will bring your door into optimal working condition. With all repairs performed, we lubricate your door with the proper spray lubricant. Before leaving your home, we give you important information on how to properly maintain your door. Without the proper knowledge of garage door mechanics, a home owner can’t be expected to maintain a door. Our trained technicians give you a quick lesson on what are the key components and how to optimize the life of your garage door.
Why choose us

    Qualified technicians fully equipped with the knowledge and parts to repair your garage door
    Fast, friendly and affordable service, with exceptional punctuality making sure to work around your schedule
    After every visit, full lubrication of all hardware (springs, hinges, bearings and ball bearing garage rollers)
    Our trained technicians will quickly go over on what needs to be maintained seasonally to keep your door running longer

profile:
Few people realize the importance of a working garage door until it breaks down - garage doors are protection for you and your belongings. They house your car, your storage, and serve as an additional entrance to your home. For many they may feel like an afterthought, but they provide a great deal of security in a way that few other doors do.
Best Choice Garage Doors

At Best Choice Garage Doors, our goal is to help you with all of your garage door needs. We are available in Toronto and GTA and specialize in any and all garage door related services including:

    Installation – When you need a new and state of the art garage door installed, we can provide you with the perfect choice for the design of your home – one that will withstand the elements and provide you with the look and security you need.
    Repair – When your garage door breaks down for any reason, our service experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We will send our professionals directly to your home to get your garage door fixed so you can feel safe and secure again.

We also offer both residential and commercial services, and are available for all of your garage door projects both large and small. Our customer service is second to none, and we will be happy to supply you with the installation, repair, or replacement that you need. Call us today to learn more about what we have to offer.

The Garage Door Depot is Canada's largest and only national garage door Sales, Service & Installation company. We have locations in most major cities across Canada.
 
We offer residential consumer and commercial products and services.  So big or small, we're the one company to call!
 
The Garage Door Depot provides new and replacement garage doors, service for all brands of residential garage doors and garage door openers. We also stock a complete line of garage door parts and accessories. The Garage Door Depot offers a wide selection of garage doors at competitive prices.

profile:
We are a small family owned business that can handle large scale jobs.  

We have been happily servicing both residential, commercial, industrial and property management customers across the GTA for the past 16 years, with over 26 years of experience in our trade. Our primary objective is to maintain the highest quality of service and workmanship in order to meet and exceed your expectations, while keeping our rates highly competitive.

We install new garage doors and automatic garage door openers as well as provide repairs to existing installations.  We serve locations in Mississauga, Etobicoke, Brampton, Oakville, Scarborough, North York and the outskirts of the Greater Toronto Area.

FULL WARRANTY on all work done, and we provide FREE quotes on all work!  Absolutely no hidden fees when we arrive, and the job will be done at the quoted price.  If there is something that we find additional to the quote, we will inform you before we start working, and if you decide to cancel the job, there will be no charge to you whatsoever.

profile:
All Overhead Doors

We have been in business since 2006, with professional staff having over 20 years of experience in the Overhead Door Industry.  We service the entire GTA and beyond including Georgetown, King City, Nobleton, Milton, Oshawa, Barrie, etc.  

We are a small company that prides itself in its service.  We specialize in Custom Residential Garage Doors in Wood or Steel Maintenance Free Insulated Doors and carry only Liftmaster/Chamberlain electric operators and all accessories.   

We have an excellent and friendly service staff to look after all your repair needs, including springs, cables, tracks, balancing lubrication, and anything related to having your garage door function properly. 

We are an official provider of many Manufacturers so there no product or style we can not provide.

We offer a 24/HR Service and FREE On Site Estimates so please contact at any time.

PLEASE VISIT OUR INSTAGRAM PAGE TO VIEW SOME OF OUR MOST RECENT PROJECTS @alloverheaddoors

profile:
Quality Garage Doors is the leading supplier and servicer of overhead doors in the GTA. We are a qualified and reliable company that has been repairing, replacing, and installing regular garage doors and springs, as well as speciality carriage doors, for many years now. To this day, we continue to offer the highest quality garage doors at the lowest prices. We service all of the GTA but specialize in Aurora, Bradford, King City, Markham, Newmarket, Pickering, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Thornhill, Woodbridge, and Vaughan.

As a qualified garage door contractor, we specialize in the installation and maintenance of garage doors, garage door springs, carriage doors, and overhead doors. We are the most experienced garage door contactor available in Toronto and its surrounding area.

Don’t sacrifice quality for price, at Quality Garage Doors we strive to keep our garage prices competitive and affordable for you and your family. Our customers are our number one priority, so it is very important to us that we provide you with a perfect solution for your overhead and carriage doors no matter what your budget.

You can always trust in a reliable garage door contractor such as Quality Garage Doors, to put a stop to problems before they turn into larger issues and cost you money. Our expertise ensures that we will have everything from your remote opener to your garage door springs working smoothly for long after they are installed.

So call Quality Garage Doors today to take advantage of our low garage door prices, our exceptional service, and our years of experience as the GTA’s best garage door contractor.

profile:
Ontario Garage Door Repair Services has been leading the garage door repair industry in the Ontario region for more than 25 years now. We are a family run business that is licensed, insured and bonded. With us, we bring to the forefront our experience, technical know-how and in-depth knowledge of all matters related to garage doors, garage door openers and garage door parts. We have gained our skills through hard work over two decades and we take pride in ourselves for being able to offer top-class services and products to our customers and clients. We specialize in both commercial garage doors as well as residential garage doors.


In the GTA, ( ON)  we have built an enviable reputation for ourselves through our competitive services and reasonable pricing. We are well known for the quality of our products and the guarantee and warranty we offer on them. So, if you are looking for garage door experts for your property, get in touch with us and our team will offer you the best garage door installation service in the area.

Why Us

Ontario Garage Door Repair Services is the best when it comes to garage door installation and garage door repair. Here is why you should choose us:

>> Two-plus decades of experience in providing garage door services
>> Affordable pricing with top quality spare parts
>> Experienced technicians with years of training and work-ex under their belts
Round the clock services and special attention to emergencies
>> 100% customer satisfaction with top-class garage door installation and repairs
